original_text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; I was jealous for Zion with great jealousy, and I was jealous for her with great fury.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 내가 시온을 위하여 크게 질투하며 그를 위하여 크게 분노함으로 질투하노라

sentences.original_text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts
I was jealous for Zion with great jealousy
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 심한 질투로 시온을 위하여 질투하였고

sentences.original_text: and I was jealous for her with great fury
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 심한 분노로 그를 위하여 질투하였노라
